issue.title: [Dev] Use #!/usr/bin/env instead of #!/bin where possible
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13648](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13648). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Not all linuxen have `bash` at `/bin/bash`. Systems that support `#!/bin/bash` support `#!/usr/bin/env bash`. The `env` variant will take the first available bash interpreter as opposed to a hardcoded location.

Hopefully this is relatively uncontroversial.
